body_text.text: Message Board (Node.js, Express.js, SASS, Javascript, Heroku, MongoDB) • GitHub: https://github.com/iMouth/Message-Board
• Developed a mobile responsive full-stack message board application with Node.js and Express.js using MVC architecture
• Stores message data on MongoDB database & utilizes mongoose library to connect to MongoDB to get and post new messages for the user
• Uses EJS library for HTML templating, SASS as a CSS preprocessor, and bcrypt for password hashing Cartoon Search (React, Firebase, Javascript)
• GitHub: https://github.com/iMouth/Cartoon-Search
• Developed a Where's Waldo inspired game with React and Firebase
• Stored coordinate data for the characters and leaderboard data (name and time) in Cloud Firestore
• Enhanced the user experience by allowing the user to choose from different maps Shopping Cart (React, Typescript)
• GitHub: https://github.com/iMouth/Shopping-Cart
• Developed a mobile responsive e-commerce shop built with React
• Allows users to browse through the shop, add an item to the cart, and manipulate the amount of a particular item at checkout before purchasing Memory Card (React, Typescript)
• GitHub: https://github.com/iMouth/Memory-Card
• Developed a mobile responsive memory card game using React with the theme of Survivor winners
• Keeps track of cards clicked until the user wins or restarts the game if a previous card becomes clicked
Weather App (Open Weather API, Javascript)
• GitHub: https://github.com/iMouth/Weather-App
• Developed a mobile responsive application that displays weather forecasts for a user-defined location
• Utilizes Open Weather API to fetch weather data to display to the user CV Creator (React, Typescript)
• GitHub: https://github.com/iMouth/CV-Creator
• Developed a mobile responsive CV creator using React, which updates the CV as the user is typing
Languages: Javascript/HTML/CSS, Python, Java, C, Typescript Frameworks: React, Express.js, Node.js, SASS Tools:
Git, Bash, MongoDB, Firebase, Heroku, Docker
